tool_description: Analyse the content of an article by submitting a URL or by posting content to the API.

api_list.name: Content Analysis
api_list.description: This endpoint analyzes the SEO content of a specified URL based on the provided keyword.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the article to be analyzed.

required_parameters.name: keyword
required_parameters.description: The primary keyword for SEO analysis.

optional_parameters.name: relatedkeywords
optional_parameters.description: Additional keywords related to the primary keyword for a more comprehensive analysis.
